1361470.name: illuminati Simulator VR
1361470.description: This Simulator transports you into a REAL Illuminati  Freemason lodge temple, According to the known texts, each room and object was displayed according to the manuals of the Free-masonic Ancient and Accepted texts,  The Map has a lot of secrets only members of the order know,  If you are already a freemason and you want to checkout a cool temple built with the specifications of the liturgy (*except for the parking lot areas)  Includes reflection chambers, agape rooms,gnostic mass with the Thelema specs, The secrets involve gesture recognition , puzzles and more, its designed mainly for VR however you can manage to getby with a gamepad if you are patient enough to figure out. the game is also sensitive to the time you log in and the day, its not the same to login at a random hour than at 6pm for example.
